title: 1.14.4crafttweaker怎么用
author: ellgo

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content:
看了一下wiki，感觉他改了格式的可能性不大，比较太多内容了
用这个写合成表，然后把他给出的代码粘贴进配置文件就行
https://crafttweakertool.rligry.com/

replies.author: ellgo
replies.txt_content:
DE_SHARK 发表于 2020-3-17 17:35
看了一下wiki，感觉他改了格式的可能性不大，比较太多内容了
用这个写合成表，然后把他给出的代码粘贴进配 ...
这个我用过，不行
1.14.4小改了一下，recipes开头改成了craftingTable开头

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
craftingTable.addShaped(String recipeName, IItemStack output, IIngredient[][] ingredients, @ZenCodeType.Optional RecipeFunctionMatrix recipeFunction);
https://docs.blamejared.com/1.14/zh/#recipes/crafting_table/
craftingTable.addShaped("1",<item:projecte:philosophers_stone>.withEmtpyTag(),
        [[<item:minecraft:redstone_block>,<item:minecraft:glowstone>,<item:minecraft:redstone_block>],
         [<item:minecraft:glowstone>,<item:minecraft:emerald_block>,<item:minecraft:glowstone>],
         [<item:minecraft:redstone_block>,<item:minecraft:glowstone>,<item:minecraft:redstone_block>]],null);复制代码
这样呢
